comments: The number of minutes past midnight represented by each of the times here can be found in A118848. - _Carl R. White_, May 01 2006
links: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..211 (full sequence)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Clock Prime.
maple: for h from 0 to 23 do for m from 0 to 59 do t:=100*h+m: if(isprime(t))then printf("%d, ", t): fi: od: od: # Nathaniel Johnston, May 17 2011
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
